mapper.select: SELECT B.BOOKING_NO, B.PT_NO, B.DOC_NO, B.BOOKING_DATE, B.PRICE, B.PAY_STATUS, B.CONSULT_DATE, B.CONSULT_TIME, M.NAME FROM BOOKING B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.PT_NO=M.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.CONSULT_DATE=TO_DATE(SYSDATE)

SELECT B.BOOKING_NO, B.PT_NO, B.DOC_NO, B.BOOKING_DATE, B.PRICE, B.PAY_STATUS, B.CONSULT_DATE, B.CONSULT_TIME, M.NAME FROM BOOKING B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.PT_NO=M.MEMBER_NO WHERE ROWNUM < 6 AND CONSULT_DATE < TO_DATE(SYSDATE) ORDER BY CONSULT_DATE DESC

SELECT B.BOOKING_NO, B.PT_NO, B.DOC_NO, B.BOOKING_DATE, B.PRICE, B.PAY_STATUS, B.BOOKING_STATUS, B.CONSULT_DATE, B.CONSULT_TIME, M.NAME FROM BOOKING B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.PT_NO=M.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.CONSULT_DATE>=TO_DATE(SYSDATE) ORDER BY CONSULT_DATE ASC, CONSULT_TIME ASC

SELECT ROOM_ID FROM BOOKING WHERE PAY_STATUS='y' AND BOOKING_STATUS='y' AND TO_CHAR(CONSULT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-dd') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-dd')
SELECT B.BOOKING_NO, B.PT_NO, B.DOC_NO, B.BOOKING_DATE, B.PRICE, B.PAY_STATUS, B.BOOKING_STATUS, B.CONSULT_DATE, B.CONSULT_TIME, M.NAME FROM BOOKING B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.PT_NO=M.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.CONSULT_DATE<TO_DATE(SYSDATE) AND BOOKING_STATUS = 'y' ORDER BY CONSULT_DATE DESC, CONSULT_TIME ASC
